product_name: Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed Duo 1.5-Season Sleeping Bag
long_description: With no zippers, drawcords or rip-and-stick to disrupt your sleep, this spacious bag sleeps 2 people comfortably and has a soft comforter that drapes naturally around you, just like your bed at home.
short_description: With no zippers, drawcords or rip-and-stick to disrupt your sleep, this spacious bag sleeps 2 people comfortably and has a soft comforter that drapes naturally around you, just like your bed at home.
